title: Kindred, The Eternal Hunters | Short First Impression Gameplay | Public ...

embed.description: Just a video to share the powers of the new champion with you guys! I think this champion is an awesome Jungler because of the Hunter's Vigor & the permanent bonus physical damage on the passive! Passive: Mark of the Kindred INNATE: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt.

body: Just a video to share the powers of the new champion with you guys! I think this champion is an awesome Jungler because of the Hunter's Vigor & the permanent bonus physical damage on the passive!

replies.body: I see kindred as a bow, does that mean he or her can go adc?
